items.summary: Ensure the application always allows the user to reach and use the Login screen, even if a previous session left `isAuthenticated=true` in localStorage and the backend actor/user profile cannot be fetched (e.g., actor initialization stalls or fails). The app must not remain indefinitely on the full-screen "Loading..." state in a way that prevents login interaction.

Add a clear recovery action whenever startup/profile loading fails or stalls that lets the user return to Login by clearing password-auth state (logout/clearAuth) without requiring manual cache clearing. This recovery action must be visible on the relevant error/timeout UI and must not rely only on a full page reload.
